attributes.review: This app has a ton of inappropriate pictures and I also keep seeing pictures of this orange man. Help this app caused so many deaths
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: The longer I was on the app the more brain cells I lost- I almost thought about getting a Trump hat🤢worst part is my dad got it too and now he’s BRIGHT ORANGE.    -infinity/10, do not buy!
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this to see more of the greatness of our president but I have seen nothing but slander of others and defacing of other organizations.
attributes.title: Disgrace

attributes.review: I wanted to see what the president of the us was doing to change ppls perception of him but I found that his promises seemed to be unfulfilled and neglected and his attitude towards America unpatriotic.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I was so devastated about the quality of the app I and so disappointed with what trump has said I expected a lot more.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I waited 10 minutes and the app still wouldn’t open.
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: It took so long to download and when it did it just showed a black screen and a picture of trump smiling 🤡😠
attributes.title: Worst app ever
It was actually very bad quality and I would not recommend it

attributes.review: this app shows me nothing but how donald trump is a terrible,disgusting,RACIST,HOMOPHOBIC, nasty man. i do not want him or any one else like him that supports his political opinions to run the country. terrible app. do not recommend.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I honestly can’t believe this app. I’d say that there’s massive caucacity but he’s orange so I guess I can’t. But like wow, taking away all of my rights as a minority? Nasty. I don’t like it. Get it out of the White House. Mega ew. 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Nasty 🤮🤮🤮🤮
